about_the_game:
Ever wondered what it’s like to use a bulldozer or a crane? Or maybe you would like to build a house of your own design? Now you can experience it from the comfort of your chair. Take on the role of a construction worker, complete given tasks to unlock a variety of vehicles and use them to renovate cities.


Make space for new buildings by tearing down the old ones. Do it methodically by using a demolition robot or an excavator, or do it the spectacular way and go straight for destruction by dynamite.

You’re responsible for designing colorful buildings from foundations up to the roof. After that you can start building with the help of a pump truck, concrete mixer and tower crane.

Gather a wide variety of construction vehicles by completing tasks, to make your work easier and more efficient. Demolish, design, build and renovate cities in this simulator and don’t forget to clean up the construction site after your work is done.

Have fun with company management, run and expand it, get creative while designing houses, use realistic heavy-duty machinery while demolishing and rebuilding cities. Experience this adventure from the comfort of your chair.

short_description: Become a construction worker - demolish, design and build using heavy machinery. Expand your abilities and unlock a variety of vehicles to build your construction company empire. Renovate and manage cities in this heavy machines simulation game.
